ProjectTitle: Uncovering the implications of N-glycosylation and protein aggregation in human disease
InitialFeedbackHistory:
16/12/2024
Ethics: you answer that you use animal data but give a ethical approval number for the use of human cells, please correct this. 
Personal data: under ethics you mention that you anonymize samples which means you process personal data; if the samples were anonymized before you received them you don't process personal data, in that case please please clearly mention this in your DMP. 
Storage/preservation: using dropbox is not recommended, you can consider KU Leuven onedrive or teams for short term storage, or have a look at the storage guide for other solutions: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
label: good with suggestions
